title: The Yellow Fortune

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Yellow Fortune is one of the companies that make up the Consortium. Only female players are allowed to join this company. Male players may instead join any of the other companies, including The Brown Engine which exclusively hires males.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:The Yellow Fortune
The Yellow Fortune
Released 31 May 2005 (Update)
Current leader Yellow Fortune Director
Headquarters Trade Octagon
Locations Keldagrim
Industry Mining

The Yellow Fortune is one of the companies that make up the Consortium. Only female players are allowed to join this company. Male players may instead join any of the other companies, including The Brown Engine which exclusively hires males.

The Giant Dwarf[edit | edit source]

During The Giant Dwarf quest, you can choose to help this company by gathering materials, primarily ore and bars, for its head secretary. After which, you can do some tasks for the director. The director will then let you join the company as a member, so that you can choose her to have a stone head of her image carved onto the giant statue that is in the middle of keldagrim.

Also, in Forgettable Tale..., you can ask her to help you remove the boards blocking a railway tunnel.

Members[edit | edit source]

  • Yellow Fortune Director
  • Yellow Fortune Secretary
  • Agmundi (presumably)

'''The Yellow Fortune''' is one of the companies that make up the [[Consortium]]. Only female players are allowed to join this company. Male players may instead join any of the other companies, including [[The Brown Engine]] which exclusively hires males.

==The Giant Dwarf==
During [[The Giant Dwarf]] quest, you can choose to help this company by gathering materials, primarily ore and bars, for its head secretary. After which, you can do some tasks for the director. The director will then let you join the company as a member, so that you can choose her to have a stone head of her image carved onto the giant statue that is in the middle of keldagrim.

Also, in [[Forgettable Tale...]], you can ask her to help you remove the boards blocking a railway tunnel.

==Members==
